title: Client Crashing in Champ Select
body:
I've never had any issues with bugsplats or client crashing, etc.. for the entire time i've played, always have an up-to-date PC with no issues, PC savvy so I keep it pretty clean and without bloatware or otherwise littered throughout. 

Over the past 24 hours however i'm getting crashes in the middle of champ select, which is penalizing me with dodge punishments and now i'm on a 30 minute wait before I can queue again.

It happens randomly, could be when someone's choosing, banning, could be when i'm alt tabbed doing something while everyone makes their choices, etc.. just randomly crashes (with no bugsplat report window or otherwise).

I've done a client repair, no idea what could be causing it otherwise. But i'd appreciate if this is a know issue and being worked on. I never dodge or afk or otherwise from games and don't want those marks against my account... nor do I want to lose LP/promo matches because of it.

replies.body:
Freezing in champ select then returning the home page is usually a result of a failure to establish a stable connection to the servers. Champ Select in all modes requires a more steady connection than the home page which is why it's more vulnerable to disconnect there. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)


http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

The client completely closes, with a windows error "this program has stopped working". But not bugsplat window or otherwise.

It just happened again randomly, in a ranked select, resulting in a dodge punishment.

EDIT: there is no freeze, the thing just closes. my PC isn't lacking in power, it can run Crysis at 240p medium settings.

Then it's likely some of League's files have been corrupted or damaged.

Repair the game by clicking the question mark icon to the top right of the patcher. Select "Repair" and let the patcher scan and repair corrupt game files. When the process is completed, you'll see the orange "Launch" button.

http://eune.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/template_lcu_changelog_1280x720.jpg?itok=uV6zjzTq
Why offer assistance if you aren't even reading the opening posts?

Apologies for not re-reading your opening post prior to my previous post.

---

It's possible that you need to complete a clean reinstallation of League in order to resolve the issue. Grab Riot's [Hextech Repair Tool](https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/player-support/tools/Hextech%20Repair%20Tool.msi) and check both the box for 'Reinstall' and 'Clean Uninstall', then hit the Start button. This will wipe all files associated with League to ensure corruption doesn't carry over, then reinstalls the game.

http://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/d/d2/Annie_HextechSkin.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160224210722

Let us know if your issue is resolved or not afterwards.
